Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Super cozy coffee spot and great atmosphere. Very very good food in great quantities. I really recommend the banana cake and the coconut tart! Had a lovely time.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: When I did stay in Amsterdam I had a great breakfast here. The coffee was super nice and the pancakes were super tasty. Thank you for the friendly service! Will come back any time I am in the area again.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Good food and great portion size on what we ordered. Clean, clear room, retro vibes. Lots of choices in vegan milks.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Friendly and cozy atmosphere. Loved the vegan food and matcha latte.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Decent vegan pancakes. Wide selection of vegan foods. Friendly service. Could go here again.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Great food (all vegan), generous portions and friendly service! They have baked goods, cakes, good coffee and a variety of lunch options. I saw they do high tea as well which I thought was quite affordable. I will definitely come back again.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: We came here for a vegan breakfast and what else can we say? We had an amazing breakfast! Also gluten-free and everything is selfmade and made with love. The cakes and the options of the meals makes every vegan heart beat faster. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Had the tempeh sandwich and it was absolutely delicious. big portion and diverse side that comes with it

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: I'm as far from vegan as it gets, but I thoroughly enjoyed their pancakes, scones and a smoothie. We had a Vegan Break-Fest for two and while it wasn't too much and was a bit pricey (27‚Ç¨) it was still enough for a good breakfast. I'm definitely not turning vegan, but I liked the "home" vibe of the place.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: The food did NOT disappoint. We had an amazing, healthy vegan breakfast here. The meals were satisfying and delicious which can sometimes be a hard combination to find. We got the buckwheat pancakes and the fig and cashew cheese bread with ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:
Great place for vegan breakfast ü•û we had the large breakfast for 2 hungry vegans and we weren‚Äôt disappointed üòä tasty food, ample choice of sweet and savory.
The staff is really nice and friendly too! Great way to start the day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: If you're looking for a healthy, authentic breakfast where the locals come, it's here. Just be prepared for a very limited menu based on the availability of local ingredients. It's small and quaint and was a nice experience. But again, a limited menu and all very health conscious. Caters to vegans.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Hands down the best vegan/vegetarian restaurant in Amsterdam. Even if you‚Äôre not a vegetarian, you should definitely try this place. We had the tempeh sandwich and the vegan rendang, both were delicious. I would especially recommend the rendang. They have a pretty decent Matcha latte as well.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Cute, retro, relaxed, veggie cafe with vegan & gluten-free options. The menu is simple but well crafted. I wanted the bibimbap but sadly they'd sold out (must be popular) so I opted for the weed burger which was delicious! It came with ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: the best cinammon roll i ever had! :-)

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:
We love it! Great vegan options. Smoothie bowls are super tasty as well as the FRESH juices. Also recommend is the cashew cheese.. a dream.
Atmosphere is cosy. Staff is super friendly and helpful.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Nice cafe with simple menu including some healthy items. Good gluten-free options. Menu items a little small and smoothie bowl was quite runny but had nice toppings. Little shop with clothes and accessories in corner.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Delicious vegan food! Fair price. The location is good. The waitresses were very kind!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Great vegetarian/vegan breakfast/brunch/lunch/early dinner place in Amsterdam East. Been coming here ever since they opened and still enjoying the food and beverages they serve. Beter & Leuk is a sweet little place, that offers healthy meal ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Very cosy place, with quick friendly service and delicious vegan breakfast and lunch options! Great value for money, portions are very decent (we actually couldn‚Äôt finish the pancakes and had them packed). I can also highly recommend the mango smoothie, so fresh and delicious. :) I will be back!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Had a small sample with great admiration. Great mix of flavours and lovely homely ambiance. For this time, experienced admirable service.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: I never had such a bad experience before. The waiter was extremely overstrained. We waited 15min for him to take our order. It took him 20min to prepare a smoothie. We reminded him that we also ordered a Kombucha- there are two types- he ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Such a cozy place with extremely friendly staff. Amazing place for a vegan lunch or cake. Love that they have a little shop in the back with unique items for sale.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Katie doesn‚Äôt like chocolate üç´ she says ‚Äòchocolate coats her veins and makes her arteries feel like clogged up stodge‚Äô. That‚Äôs not her exact words, I can‚Äôt remember her exact words (I rarely listen closely to what she says, I‚Äôm a busy man) ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Super sweet place! Very colorful and warm, original menu (in a good way ;) ) and friendly staff. Will definitely go back! (I had a marinated tempeh sandwich with wasabi mayo, which came with a yummy rucola/lentil salad - very much recommended!)

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Vegan food made delicious. Oven baked eggs and spinach pancake are to die for.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: my favorite brunch place in amsterdam , super friendly staff and overall awesome experience

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:
Amazing vegan bowl

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Very comfortable environment, love the vegan options and the host makes great cappuccino with oat milk.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: So lovely! Cozy atmosphere, kind service and delicious food. Loved that it was mostly vegan.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: It's like entering a parallel universe of natural goodness. Great food and drinks, all hand and homemade with love. So good to have a place like this in town. I'll be back for sure (:

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Best vegan food ever! Delicious, good portions and best quality! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Lovely place, nice and cozy. The menu is all vegan except for one dish, so you can say it's a non-vegan friendly place. The hot drinks came with a small piece of a very good carrot cake. The breakfast for 2 was excellent. The stuff was nice and friendly.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Great food still but since it‚Äôs changed hands it lacks all the character and cosines it‚Äôs once had which is a real shame.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Cute place to eat great vegan breakfast and lunch. Staff was very friendly, the kale pesto sandwich delicious.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Beter and Leuk has wonderful and healthy breakfast options. It has a relaxed atmosphere and friendly staff. Their croissants are absolutely mind blowing, and their savoury sandwiches are just as satisfying. Best place to have a vegan ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: The menu is offering almost any meal in a gluten-free version, so there are many opportunities. The food was very delicious. I can recommend the buckwheat pancakes - the most fluffiest pancakes I ever had!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Nice cozy decor but extremely bad customer service. The tall girl who helped us at casa was unbelievably rude and arrogant. We've never felt we're being welcomed for a single moment. I'll never visit again.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Really nice coffee! I live close so this will definitely become my new coffee spot. Also the food looks super delicious, but still need to try. Will update soon...

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Wow, it‚Äôs astounding the service here, the waitress seems not understand you at all not looking at you as alien

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Ate a breakfast here. The atmosphere is great, cozy and almost like in someone's living room. The vegan foods are delicious. Highly recommend if you are a vegan and in the neighbourhood looking for breakfast/brunch/lunch, they have many things to choose from.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:
Nice food. Extremely bad customer experience.

Name: Beter & Leuk

Review Text:
Is a Vegan and Gluten Free restaurant.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:

P.S. he eats alot

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Gorgeous cafe with lovely staff ‚Äì I had a latte with oat milk, a spinach pancake with roasted veg and an oat scone with coconut cream and jam, it was all fantastic. I usually hate eating alone but the atmosphere was welcoming and relaxed ‚Äì I could have sat there for hours. One of my favourite brunches ever.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: If it's 'really tasty and a bit surprising wholesome food for Vegans' you're looking for, then visit Beter & Leuk!!! The portion sizes are spot on and you can taste the care that's been put in your meal by the wonderful staff. Choice ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: A beautiful cafe with delicious breakfast and lunch options but also tea, coffee and cakes. What's great is that almost everything is vegan!! I had the scones and buckweat pancakes. They we're so good! The staff is nice and the cafe looks ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Delicious food and excellent cappuccino!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Really delicious hearty vegan lunch (with great gluten free options!) and dessert (I recommend the sweet potato brownie). Also very nice staff. I highly recommend!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Small, cosy place. It wasn't too busy on a Wednesday afternoon, so I like that, also not noisy. Waitress was pleasant and prices were okay. The scones are really good. Interior is nice and retro, only sometimes a bit old (my chair was literally taped together). I would come back here :-)

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Super-super nice food with a Korean twist! Highly recommend. However, make sure you double-check if you receive the food you actually ordered. My friend and I both have gluten intolerance, and inquired about gluten free options upon ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: High quality and healthy food. Nice people!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Ate a breakfast here. The atmosphere is great, cozy and almost like in someone's living room. The vegan foods are delicious. Highly recommend if you are a vegan and in the neighbourhood looking for breakfast/brunch/lunch, they have many things to choose from.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: This place is nice and cozy but average at best.  If you are looking for a cute place to have coffee or tea B&L does the trick but we wont be returning for brunch. The menu is small and we ended up waiting over 25minutes for our food and the portions were very small. We left hungry.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Lovely little vegan restaurant with delicious breakfast options. Staff are friendly and the breakfast I had was so delicious.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Incredibly tasty vegan food ü•∞üëå‚òÄÔ∏è

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: One of my favorite spots for a vegan breakfast in town. Very small which makes it intimate and personal. The food is very tasty and the service is good :)

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Unreal vegan breakfast, one of the best breakfasts we have ever had! Really nice vibe and lovely owner too. We loved the tea too.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: What a lovely caf√© in the neighbourhood of de Pijp in Amsterdam! Great place to drink coffee or grab a bite if you're in the area. Nice and kind staff, great selection of products and definitely on the more affordable side of caf√©s in Amsterdam. I only wish the place was a bit bigger and offered more spacious seats!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: I love this little vegetarian place with almost everything vegan as well! Like sitting in the living room of your very urban friend. The Dutch would describe it as 'gezellig'.. cosy. They have free WiFi, large pots of tea with banana bread. ‚Ä¶

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Delightful caf√© with many GLUTEN FREE options. The Buckwheat pancakes are nutty, crispy and full of cinnamon. The service is friendly and the prices reasonable. Highly recommend!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Tasty desserts and hot chocolate. They don‚Äôt serve lunch meals after 4 pm. So expect that many positions on the menu will be over by this time.

Name: Beter & Leuk

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Nice People! The Food is so yummie :)

Review Text:

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Note that the place is not fully vegan, the street was quite a mess but the inside was really cute. Service is really slow, food was ok but a bit pricey.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text:
[VEGAN and FODMAP friendly!]

A cozy breakfast restaurant with a very "homey" feeling to it. A small but diverse menu and a comfortable sitting area

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: A really sweet place with a lot of vegan options, the food is really tasty and fresh. The 2 girls who worked during our sit here were really sweet

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Whatever we ate was tasty, vegan chocolate brownie was delicious. Negatives were that they didn't have what we wanted to eat and there wasn't much for kids and we feel it was little overpriced

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: When I visit this place I want to eat everything that is on the menu and buy all the nice things in their little shop-in-caf√©. The food is mostly organic and/or grown locally.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Food was good (considering it was vegan) but my chai was disappointing. Anyway, always good to have more plant-based options available so thumbs up for that!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: We tried the vegan breakfast and it was absolutely amazing. And the shop is really cute and ho

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Extremely  good vegan breakfast for 2, well made and super tasty. Will come again

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Very happy to have this great place around the corner of my house. Their salads and fresh juices are the best in town!

Name: Beter & Leuk

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Cozy place with homemade food. Good for if youre staying in the area. Portions a little too small for a man.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: If you're looking for cozy vegan, this tiny palce is for you. Varied vegan and vegetarian options that look and taste great.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Tasty entrees and the woman working there was super nice. It was great to have a healthy, hearty meal while traveling.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Amazing the flavours you can feel in the food, marvelous place, and service super gentle, for me that is it everything is perfect!

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Fantastic healthy/vegetarian options and friendly service. Even if you aren't looking specifically looking for a vegetarian meal, this place is still worth a stop.

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Great food but bad service. One of the girls was really unfriendly en let us sit without drinks for more than one hour.

Name: Beter & Leuk

Name: Beter & Leuk

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Visited twice during our visit to Amsterdam. Really nice cafe, awesome and tasty vegan breakfast and lunch and friendly service. üëå

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Haven for excellent, interesting food.  The staff is more committed than just doing their jobs, but really making this a special place.

Name: Beter & Leuk

Review Text: Tasty healthy food and snacks. Vegan and vegetarian friendly. Nice atmosphere.

Name: Beter & Leuk

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Good food but when I went it was very busy and there was a very long wait of almost an hour (despite having a reservation).

Name: Beter & Leuk
Review Text: Home made creative and delicious bakeries. Love that there is one "skinny" and one "dirty pleasure" menu.

Name: Beter & Leuk
